meanings: precious, valuable, dear, (가치를 따질 수 없을 만큼) priceless
감사 I'll use it with loving care.

vlive.korean: [이해불가] 무슨 와칸다 보물 만지는 것처럼 소중하게 만지고 있죠? [Cannot understand] Are you touching some treasure from Wakanda? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.93
vlive.english: [Cannot understand] Are you touching some treasure from Wakanda?

vlive.korean: [울 쁘띠가 세상 둘도 없는 꽃이라 소중하게 모시고] 아니 케이스만 있는 거예요? [Petit is the special flower] You just gave me a pot? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [W PROJECT] 쁘띠 생일 맞이 아주 특별한 선물대잔치🥬🐼(Woollim rookie’s giving special gift for YUNSEONG)
vlive.english: [Petit is the special flower] You just gave me a pot?

vlive.korean: 저요 엄마가 소중하게 낳아주신 저의... I pick myself. I'm precious, my mom brought me into this world. 듣기 View video VICTON : 🎉VICTON 데뷔 1000일 기념 하.땅.사 VLIVE🎉💛💙 VICTON Debut 1000th Day V LIVE
vlive.english: I pick myself. I'm precious, my mom brought me into this world.

vlive.korean: 왕자니까 소중하게 다뤄야 돼요. Since I'm a prince, please handle it with care. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라> 동시생중계
vlive.english: Since I'm a prince, please handle it with care.

vlive.korean: 좀 소중하게 느껴진다고 해야 되나? more precious and meaningful than other times? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : THEBOYZ 1st Anniversary🎉 🎉 🎉 🎉
vlive.english: more precious and meaningful than other times?

examples.korean: I really value him as a friend. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그를 친구로서 정말 소중하게 생각한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We value your business and hope to continue serving you in the future. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당사는 귀사와의 거래를 소중하게 생각하며 앞으로도 지속적으로 거래할 수 있기를 바라는 바입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We value your business and hope to continue serving you in the future. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I've learned that all a person has in life is family and friends. If you lose those, you have nothing, so friends are to be treasured more than anything else in the world. (Trey Parker) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인생에서 인간이 가질 수 있는 모든 것은 가족과 친구라는 것을 알게 되었다. 이들을 잃게 되면 당신에겐 아무것도 남지 않는다. 따라서 친구를 세상 그 어떤 것 보다 더 소중하게 여겨야 한다. (트레이 파커, 친구명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I've learned that all a person has in life is family and friends. If you lose those, you have nothing, so friends are to be treasured more than anything else in the world. (Trey Parker) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The man treasures the rusty old bicycle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 남자는 그 녹슬고 오래된 자전거를 소중하게 여긴다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The man treasures the rusty old bicycle. Add to Wordbook
